title: Google\Cloud\Monitoring\V3\AlertPolicy\Condition\Trigger
name: Trigger
description:
Specifies how many time series must fail a predicate to trigger a condition. If not specified, then a {count: 1} trigger is used.

Generated from protobuf message google.monitoring.v3.AlertPolicy.Condition.Trigger

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.count
params.description: The absolute number of time series that must fail the predicate for the condition to be triggered.

params.name: data.percent
params.description: The percentage of time series that must fail the predicate for the condition to be triggered.
